headline: T-Mobile US (TMUS) Partners With LA28 As Official Telecom Provider For 2028 Olympics
summary: T-Mobile US (TMUS) recently announced its selection as the Official Telecommunications Services Provider for the Olympic and Paralympic Games in Los Angeles (LA28), a significant event showcasing its advanced 5G solutions. This development, alongside strategic partnerships like its new deal with Southwest Airlines to provide free WiFi, might have bolstered TMUS's 5.1% share price increase over the last quarter. Meanwhile, the broader market, illustrated by the tech-heavy Nasdaq and S&P 500,...

headline: US court upholds Verizon $46.9 million fine over location data
summary: A federal appeals court on Wednesday upheld the Federal Communications Commission's $46.9 million fine against U.S. wireless carrier Verizon Communications for illegally sharing access to customers’ location information.  A three-judge panel of the Second Circuit Court of Appeals rejected Verizon's argument, saying "the customer data at issue plainly qualifies as customer proprietary network information."  In April 2024, the FCC fined the largest U.S. wireless carriers nearly $200 million in total over mishandling customers’ location information.

headline: Get iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 and iPhone Air all on Us at T-Mobile, America’s Best Network
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., September 10, 2025--T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS) will offer the latest iPhone generation, the latest Apple Watch lineup, and AirPods Pro 3. All four iPhone models — iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max — feature the Center Stage front camera for next level selfies, 48MP Fusion camera systems, the latest-generation chips for incredible performance, and fantastic all-day battery life. headline: Blis Integrates T-Mobile Advertising Solutions Data into DSP, Redefining Audience Discovery in Omnichannel Advertising
summary: Blis, the omnichannel demand-side platform built for precision at scale, today announced the launch of T-Mobile Advertising Solutions' app ownership and app engagement data within the Blis platform. The integration gives advertisers access to one of the most accurate and powerful datasets in digital marketing, redefining how brands discover and activate high-value audiences.

headline: Semtech Delivers Network Lifeline with T-Mobile’s T-Priority Certified Router
summary: CAMARILLO, Calif., September 10, 2025--Semtech Corporation (Nasdaq: SMTC), a leading provider of high-performance semiconductor, Internet of Things (IoT) systems and cloud connectivity service solutions, today announced that several products, including its AirLink® XR60 5G router solution has received certification for T-Mobile’s T-Priority solution featuring a dedicated slice of its 5G Standalone (SA) network. headline: LA28 Olympic and Paralympic Games Selects T-Mobile for Business as its Official Telecommunications Services Provider
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., September 10, 2025--The Un-carrier is once again showing the competition why it's the gold standard. Today, T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS) announced that the Los Angeles Organizing Committee (LA28) has selected T-Mobile for Business as the Official Telecommunications Services Provider of the Olympic and Paralympic Games in Los Angeles.
